snippet: The proposed $35 billion (20.65 billion pounds) merger between U.S.-based Omnicom Group Inc and French rival Publicis Groupe SA has been called off as the challenges in forming the world's largest advertising agency proved too immense for the part...

headline.print_headline: Omnicom, Publicis Call Off Proposed $35 Billion Merger
headline.main: Omnicom, Publicis Call Off Proposed $35 Billion Merger

lead_paragraph: The proposed $35 billion (20.65 billion pounds) merger between U.S.-based Omnicom Group Inc and French rival Publicis Groupe SA has been called off as the challenges in forming the world's largest advertising agency proved too immense for the partners.
